DOC.brief_summary: Deployment impact service member family , cost high . Spouses ' reaction deployment may include emotional distress , loneliness , anticipatory fear grief , somatic complaint , depression . The goal help spouse learn way manage stress solve problem related deployment reintegration , communication , manage long distance relationship , common problem . The study compare telephone support group online education session . The study enroll 160 spouse . In Telephone Support group , group leader participant meet 12 time six month focus education , skill build support . Education Only online session provide education content , without skill build support . Content include strategy reduce eliminate communication difficulty deployment , find help ; practical concern deployment ; foster resilience decrease stress ; foster relationship apart , negotiate role relationship ; change deployment ; strategy support spouse service member ; cue alert spouse seek mental health service family . Outcomes include resilience , depression , anxiety cop behavior . Telephone data collection conduct baseline , six twelve month .
DOC.brief_title: Telephone Support During Overseas Deployment Military Spouses
DOC.criteria: spouse significant ( live marry least one year deployment ) overseas deploy military service member deploy least six month live marry least one year deployment
